keys: aislante de la pared de la cavidad

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_4a2072232cb85186c4199c06d794375dc2248567</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cost effective energy loss reduction in buildings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kosteneffektive Energieverlustverringerung der 
Gebäude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction rentable de déperdition d'énergie 
des bâtiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Redução eficaz da perda de energia do custo nos
edifícios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione redditizia di perdita di energia di 
costruzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικώς αποδοτική μείωση ενεργειακής απώλειας των
κτηρίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción rentable de la pérdida de energía en
edificios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fourth of five illustrations showing several ways to lessen heat losses in buildings. The figure shows cavity wall insulation that is expensive to install but can offset the expenses through money saved in energy savings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cavity wall insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pay-back time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy losses</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel von fünf Abbildungen, die einige 
Methoden zeigen, die Wärmeverlust in den Gebäuden zu vermindern. 
Die Abbildung zeigt Raumwandisolierung, die kostspielig ist zu 
installieren, aber kann die Unkosten durch das Geld versetzen, das in 
den Energiesparungen gespart wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quart de cinq illustrations montrant plusieurs 
voies de diminuer des pertes de chaleur dans les bâtiments. La 
figure montre l'isolation de mur de cavité qui est chère d'installer
mais peut excentrer les dépenses par l'argent économisé en épargne
d'énergie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth de cinco ilustrações que mostram 
diversas maneiras diminuir perdas de calor nos edifícios. A 
figura mostra a isolação da parede da cavidade que é cara instalar 
mas pode deslocar as despesas através do dinheiro conservado em 
economias da energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quarto di cinque illustrazioni che 
mostrano parecchi modi diminuire le perdite di calore in costruzioni. 
La figura mostra l'isolamento della parete della cavità che è 
costoso installare ma può sfalsare le spese attraverso soldi 
risparmiati nel risparmio di energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο πέντε απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν διάφορους 
τρόπους να ελαττωθούν οι απώλειες θερμότητας στα κτήρια. Ο 
αριθμός εμφανίζει μόνωση τοίχων κοιλοτήτων που είναι ακριβή να 
εγκαταστήσει αλλά μπορεί να αντισταθμίσει τις δαπάνες μέσω των 
χρημάτων που κερδίζονται στην εξοικονόμηση ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto de cinco ilustraciones que muestran varias
maneras de aminorar pérdidas de calor en edificios. La figura 
muestra el aislante de la pared de la cavidad que es costoso instalar 
pero puede compensar los costos a través del dinero salvado en 
ahorros de la energía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Raumwandisolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rückzahlungzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energieverluste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isolation de mur de cavité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps de remboursement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déperditions d'énergie thermiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">isolação da parede da cavidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo do pay-back</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perdas de energia térmicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">isolamento della parete della cavità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo di rimborso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">perdite di energia termiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόνωση τοίχων κοιλοτήτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρόνος επιστροφής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμικές ενεργειακές απώλειες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aislante de la pared de la cavidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo del reembolso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pérdidas de energía termales</string>
          </keyword>
